question: Name one of the major neighborhoods in Keratsini, Greece.
asked_question_translated: Sebutkan salah satu lingkungan utama di Keratsini, Yunani.
answer: Salah satu lingkungan utama di Keratsini, Yunani adalah Amfiali.
answer_translated_eng: One of the main neighbourhoods in Keratsini, Greece is Amfiali.
